title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height does not change when the font size is modified.
EB: The label's height should be justified with the font size when it is modified.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a label to the software GUI. 2. Edit the label's font size to be "18 points" and observe that the height of the label does not change.
